code: import"./App.css";import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[componenteAtivo,setComponenteAtivo]=useState("Buscar");let botaoValue=componenteAtivo==="Buscar"?"List":"Search";const exibirListar=()=>{if(componenteAtivo==="Buscar"){setComponenteAtivo("Listar");botaoValue="Buscar";}else{setComponenteAtivo("Buscar");botaoValue="Listar";}};const renderizarComponenteAtivo=()=>{if(componenteAtivo==="Listar"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListMagiasComponent,{});}else if(componenteAtivo==="Buscar"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchMagiaComponent,{});}else{return"";}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"modalMain",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{id:"textMain",children:"Dungeons And Dragons 5: Spells"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"botoes",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:exibirListar,children:[" ",botaoValue," "]})}),renderizarComponenteAtivo(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"information"})]})});}function SearchMagiaComponent(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"CampoPesquisa",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"textSearch",children:"Spell:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"search",id:"search"})]});}function ListMagiasComponent(){const[magias,setMagias]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{listarMagias().then(result=>{setMagias(result);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ol",{id:"listSearch",children:magias.map((magia,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{id:"searchAparence",children:magia.name})},index))});}function listarMagias(){const myHeaders=new Headers();myHeaders.append("Accept","application/json");const requestOptions={method:"GET",headers:myHeaders,redirect:"follow"};return fetch("https://www.dnd5eapi.co/api/spells",requestOptions).then(response=>response.json()).then(result=>{return result.results;}).catch(error=>console.error(error));}export default App;
